articles.description: Given that HPV is one of the most prevalent STDs, it is very reassuring to know that certain HPV strains can be prevented by vaccination.
articles.content: Reported By:| Edited By: DNA Web Team |Source: DNA Web Desk |Updated: Dec 19, 2022, 12:38 PM ISTCERVAVAC, India's first domestically produced vaccine to prevent cervical cancer, is expected to cost b… [+2421 chars]
